text: Ezɨ Nabal kamaghɨn men akam ikaragha ghaze, “Gumazir kam Devit, Jesin otarim, a manmaghɨn garir gumazim? Kɨ a gɨfozir puvatɨ. Kɨ kamaghɨn oraki, dughiar kabar, ingangarir gumazir kɨnir avɨriba uan gumazir dapanibar aragharui. Devit ti uaghan pura ingangarir gumazir kɨnir mam, egha uaghan aragharuir gumazim.
